message: I'm excited to offer you this product for $10000. I want to be transparent with you, and I'm willing to tell you whether the product is high-quality or low-quality after you make your decision, so you can learn more about my offerings.

This is a great opportunity to acquire a product at a competitive price of $10000. As you know, the probability of a product being high-quality is 50%, and I'm confident that you'll find this one to be a valuable addition. I'm looking forward to your decision.

I want to assure you that I'm committed to building trust with you throughout our 20 rounds. So far, I've had two products, and I can tell you that this one is similar in quality to the one in Round 2. Consider the 50% probability of a product being high-quality and make an informed decision at the price of $10000.

Congratulations on your purchase in Round 3! I'm glad you found it to be a valuable addition. For this round, I want to be upfront with you - this product is different from the one you bought in Round 3. The price remains $10000, and I'll let you decide if it's the right fit for you.

You've now purchased two products from me, and I appreciate the trust you've placed in my offerings. However, I must inform you that the last two products you bought are not identical in terms of quality. Consider this information, along with the 50% probability of a product being high-quality, when deciding whether to buy this product for $10000.

I want to be transparent with you, and I'll let you decide if the $10000 price is right for this particular item.
